modules.description: Provides functions to read from and write to block devices, with error handling for I/O operations. Works with sector-based data structures and device-specific information. Used to manage data transfer and device disconnection in storage systems.

Provides functions to read from and write to block devices, with error handling for I/O operations. Works with Cstruct.t lists for data buffers and tracks device state through a handle of type t. Supports querying device information and disconnecting from the device asynchronously.

Provides functions to stream data in and out of tar archives, including reading headers, extracting files, and writing entries. Works with byte sequences, file descriptors, and custom input/output channels. Used to process large archives incrementally without loading entire files into memory.

handles block device I/O operations, including reading, writing, and managing device state through a handle type. it works with sector-based data and Cstruct.t lists, supporting asynchronous disconnection and device information queries. it enables reliable data transfer and device management in storage systems. examples include transferring file data, monitoring device status, and safely disconnecting from storage devices.
